page.title: 16PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: In the playground we play football, stag,thirty seconds,line tig and French skipping.First break and last break are 15 minutes long and dinner break is 45 minutes long.The younger children like to play He-man, Spiderman,Starwars,Mums and Dads etc. In the playground the girls mostly play French skipping where two people stand in an elastic rope and one person jumps.We have different songs to go with the steps like Banana, Hot Cross Buns and Big Ben.The skipping rope gets higher,thinner and wider. Some of the Infants have started playing French skipping.They are not very good but are slowly getting better.Sometimes we do not play,we just talk to our friends.
